{"id":827081253,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"6 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1666328276,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/827081253/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"The Employee That Worked on the Longest Task","memory":"53.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int hardestWorker(int n, int[][] logs) {\n        int max_val = logs[0][1], id = logs[0][0];\n        for(int i=1; i<logs.length; i++){\n            int time_req = logs[i][1] - logs[i-1][1];\n            if(time_req >= max_val){\n                if(time_req == max_val){\n                    id = Math.min(id, logs[i][0]);\n                }else{\n                    max_val = time_req;\n                    id = logs[i][0];\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return id;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"the-employee-that-worked-on-the-longest-task","has_notes":false}
